name: Introduction to Islamic Art
description: This course provides a foundation for understanding the art of Islamic cultures. It examines the Islamic worldview, Islamic culture, and the art of the Islamic world from the 7th century to the present.

name: History of Islamic Art and Architecture
description: This course examines the history of Islamic art and architecture from the early Islamic period to the modern era. It covers the development of the various architectural, artistic, and decorative traditions in different Islamic cultures.

name: Islamic Calligraphy
description: This course focuses on the art of Islamic calligraphy and its development from its earliest beginnings to its use in modern art. It covers the history, techniques, and styles of Islamic calligraphy as well as its role in Islamic culture and the contemporary art world.
prerequisites: History of Islamic Art and Architecture

name: Islamic Painting and Illumination
description: This course covers the history and practice of Islamic painting and illumination, from the earliest examples to the present day. It examines the various techniques, materials, and styles used in Islamic painting and illumination, and their relationship to Islamic culture and art history.
prerequisites: History of Islamic Art and Architecture

name: Islamic Textiles and Ceramics
description: This course focuses on the history and practice of Islamic textiles and ceramics. It covers the techniques, materials, and styles used in Islamic textiles and ceramics, as well as their relationship to Islamic culture and art history.
prerequisites: History of Islamic Art and Architecture
